reviewText: For an Indie Film, this is good stuff.  You got insanity, love, hate, and a nice plot.  Acting is great.
This movie is a keeper. The movie had good acting and plot. Anyone who likes these types of twisted thrillers would like this movie. I'm glad I bought it.

I LOVE Tracey Nelson, although she's not a big Hollywood name.  The Perfect Nanny is one of my favorite movies featuring Nelson, and is well worth a watch.  The acting is good and overall, it's a good story, although somewhat violent.

The plot thickens when Nelson's unfaithful, controlling husband tries to "re-enter" her life, causing her to go somewhat "amok," and eventually she murders him to get the man of "her dreams," a doctor whom she housekeeps for and doubles as nanny for his two children.

If you like Nelson, and a plot that is interesting, The Perfect Nanny is for you.
I do  want  A  really good sound of that dvd.  So I don't have to turn up really loud
This is a good movie, but it's from 2000.  Not from 2016
The volume on it is was too low and I put my tv on full blast, I wish that I could return it and get another better one....:(
Not a family movie, theres murder and violence. The maid is phyco and the story is a bit boring. I wouldn't recommend this if you have kids
The perfect nanny is an very exciting film. All people who loves thriller must buy this DVD. It's highly recommended.
